Package de.mycrocast.android.sdk.chat

Interface Chat

All Superinterfaces:
de.mycrocast.android.sdk.observer.Observable<Chat.Observer>
public interface Chat extends de.mycrocast.android.sdk.observer.Observable<Chat.Observer>
Interface for controlling the chat workflow of the mycrocast sdk.

This is the entry point for anything related to chat activity.

To receive updates for a specific chatroom, you first need to register and implement the observer and then join the specific chat with the provided functions. Changes within the chat are propagated though the observer

  • Method Details

    • getChatRoomStatus

      ChatRoomStatus getChatRoomStatus(long streamId)
      Request the chat status for a specific live stream
      Parameters:
      streamId - - the streamId for which to request the status of the chat
      Returns:
      the current status, unknown is returned when the chat was not joined beforehand or no stream with the id was found

    • joinChatRoom

      boolean joinChatRoom(long streamId)
      Join the chat if a chat is present for the provided stream Implement the Observer interface to receive the OnChatRoomJoined callback as soon as the chat was joined. Only after joining a chat the status can be retrieved and updates for the chatroom are received
      Parameters:
      streamId - true if the streamId belongs to an existing stream otherwise false

    • leaveChatRoom

      void leaveChatRoom(long streamId)
      Leave a chatroom, which results in no further updates for the current chat room
      Parameters:
      streamId - - the stream id of the stream from where to leave the chat

    • getCurrentMessage

      Optional<List<ChatMessage>> getCurrentMessage(long streamId)
      Get all available chat messages for the chat from the provided stream
      Parameters:
      streamId - - the id of the stream from which to get the messages
      Returns:
      - the messages if the provided id belongs to an existing chatroom, otherwise an empty optional

    • chatJoined

      boolean chatJoined(long streamId)
      Checks if a chatroom for a specific stream was already joined
      Parameters:
      streamId - - the id of the stream
      Returns:
      true if the chat is currently joined otherwise false

    • reportChatMessage

      void reportChatMessage(ChatMessage chatMessage, ReportReason reportReason, String additionalInformation)
      Send a report of a chat message to our system. This does not automatically removes a chatter from the chat
      Parameters:
      chatMessage - - the chat message that lead to the report
      reportReason - - the reason of the reporter as what is wrong with the message
      additionalInformation - - any additional information the reporter wants to provide

    • sendChatMessage

      boolean sendChatMessage(long streamId, String message)
      Send a chat message with the provided content to the chatroom of the provided id The message can be at maximum 255 characters. Larger messages are cut off The message is only send if the chatroom is active and the chat room is currently joined
      Parameters:
      streamId - - the id of the stream
      message - - the message to send
      Returns:
      true if the chatroom is active and joined, false otherwise
